## ContractCaseDslPlugin type

Represents just the part of a plugin that can be used to generate DSL classes. This is exported seprately, as processors that want to use the DSL declaration might not know (or care about) the type parameters for the overall plugin.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ContractCaseDslPlugin = {
    description: PluginDescription;
    dsl?: PluginDslDeclaration;
};
```
**References:** [PluginDescription](./case-plugin-base.plugindescription.md)<!-- -->, [PluginDslDeclaration](./case-plugin-base.plugindsldeclaration.md)
